tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished T34 at California's Q-School, earning conditional status for the Mackenzie Tour...Finished T8 at the Syncrude Boreal Open in Fort McMurray.
tourBios.personal: Favorite course he's played is Augusta National and wants to play Pebble Beach...Big Atlanta Braves fan...Dream foursome would include Payne Stewart, his dad and his brother...Twitter handle is @dbogolf4

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T8th in 2015 at the The Syncrude Boreal Open Presented by AECON.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T29th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
